sections.title: Why we exist
sections.content: We exist to honor God by establishing Christ-centered, Spirit-empowered, socially responsible churches and campus ministries in every nation.

sections.title: Honor God, Make Disciples
sections.content: We follow Jesus and help others follow Him. Our starting point, goal, and motive is the honor of God. We desire to honor God in every area of life. We make disciples by engaging culture and community, establishing biblical foundations, equipping believers to minister, and empowering disciples to make disciples.

sections.title: Our Core Values
sections.content: We are a family of churches that values the Lordship of Jesus Christ, Discipleship, Evangelism, Leadership Development, and Family.

buttons.text: Learn more about our core values

sections.title: Change the Campus, Change the World
sections.content: We are committed to reaching the next generation of leaders on campuses across Indonesia. We believe that God called us to reach and to raise the future leaders of our nation through our campus ministry known as Every Nation Campus (ENC). We believe in students because we know that they are students today but they are leaders tomorrow. We believe that if we can change the campus, we can change the world.

sections.title: Church Planting
sections.content: We are committed to establishing Christ-centered, Spirit-empowered, socially responsible churches in every nation. We believe that God called us to plant churches in every nation. We believe that if we can plant a church, we can change a community.

sections.title: In Every Nation
sections.content: We believe that God called us not just to gather people for a weekly worship service but to prepare and send missionaries across the global believing that a mission field can become a mission force. We pray, we give and We go to the ends for the earth.
